class.name: AudioStreamPlaylist
class.brief_description: [AudioStream] that includes sub-streams and plays them back like a playlist.

method.name: get_bpm
method.description: Returns the BPM of the playlist, which can vary depending on the clip being played.

method.name: get_list_stream
method.description: Returns the stream at playback position index.

method.name: set_list_stream
method.description: Sets the stream at playback position index.

members.member: Fade time used when a stream ends, when going to the next one. Streams are expected to have an extra bit of audio after the end to help with fading.
If [code]true[/code], the playlist will loop, otherwise the playlist will end when the last stream is finished.
If [code]true[/code], the audio clip will loop, otherwise when the clip ends, the next one is played. The audio file loop import setting is not used inside the playlist.
If [code]true[/code], the playlist will shuffle each time playback starts and each time it loops.
Amount of streams in the playlist.

constants.constant: Maximum amount of streams supported in the playlist.
